title: New wave of podcasts aimed at younger, wider audience
text: New wave of podcasts aimed at younger, wider audience Saturday, 24 October 2015 (20 minutes ago) Former Spotify boss heads team hoping to attract reality TV fans to format As listeners look forward to the return of hit US true-crime podcast Serial, audio producers are hoping to recreate its success with a new wave of podcasts aimed at the reality TV generation. An audio diary by teenage cancer survivors and subjects as ...
